alert.note: Alert for Muscogee; Talbot; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 7:51PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Marion, southeastern Muscogee, Chattahoochee, northern Stewart, southeastern Upson, northwestern Webster, western Crawford, northwestern Schley, Talbot and Taylor Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 750 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Po Biddy Crossroads to near Cusseta to near Omaha, and moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Buena Vista, Butler, Roberta, Talbotton, Cusseta, Reynolds, Junction City, Geneva, Fort Moore, North Fort Moore, Upatoi, Brantley, Juniper, Rupert, Brooklyn, Renfroe, Oakland, Manta, Zellobee and Omaha. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
